div.p:
Porsenna
rex Etruscorum, grauissimus regii nominis suffragator, Tarquinium
manu ingerens, tribus continuis annis trepidam urbem
terruit conclusit obsedit; et nisi hostem uel Mucius constanti
urendae manus patientia uel uirgo Cloelia admirabili transmeati
fluminis audacia permouissent, profecto Romani conpulsi forent
perpeti aut captiuitatem hoste insistente superati, aut seruitutem
recepto rege subiecusubiecti.
